message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $8800?
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm not sure I can go to $9000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8500?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway this time, but I need to get at least $9100 for it. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still trying to save a bit of money. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8800?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit stuck, Bob. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I'll sell it to you for $9200, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $9200, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, and that's my final offer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9000?
